products.title: Hopsack Wicker Curtain
products.metadescription: Hopsack Wicker Curtain in Cream. Made to measure from £20.59 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our rustic Hopsack range offers you a natural textured fabric which combines tradition with a contemporary feel.  
 
These classic cream curtains have an attractive textured finish and will fit in well in most rooms due to the neutral tone of the fabric. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR0824 Fabric Colour: Wicker Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain
products.metadescription: Azurite Chenille Honey Yellow Curtain in Yellow. Made to measure from £29.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Azurite Chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft honey curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary yellow tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. Pair with cool modern greys or contrasting navy to act as a statement piece within your interior. This fabric will provide an elegant finish to rooms filled with wooden and natural tones. All our curtains are lovingly handmade within the UK. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all our curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1227 Fabric Colour: Honey Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Banbury Parchment Mink Curtain
products.metadescription: Banbury Parchment Mink Curtain in Brown. Made to measure from £32.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Banbury Parchment Mink Curtain will beautifully accent an earthy and contemporary interior. It features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey-brown hue with a textured appearance. This quality fabric curtain is fully lined and is perfect for adding layered interest to your space with soft and sumptuous textiles.  
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1171 Fabric Colour: Parchment Material: 78% Polyester 14% Cotton 8% Linen Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes
